Trade/Device Name(s): TEG 6s Hemostasis System Citrated: K, KH, RT, FF Assay Cartridge
TEG® 6s Hemostasis System Citrated: K, KH, RT, FF Assay Cartridge
Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose System For In Vitro Coagulation Studies
Methodologies: Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) of meniscus motion data
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Haemonetics TEG 6s Hemostasis System Citrated: K, KH, RT, FF Assay Cartridge for semi-quantitative assessment of coagulation in citrated whole blood using thromboelastography.
Indications for Use Summary: Provides semi-quantitative indications of hemostasis state from citrated whole blood in adult patients, including assessments of coagulation for cardiovascular surgery and cardiology procedures, usable in the laboratory or point-of-care.
